<blink>Hello     world!</blink>

She blinked slowly back at him.

Then, backed away.

"speed, not haster" he said

<git> C-C-C-C-COMBO BREAKER </git>

And now, we see for which the merger merges.

 "How eerie!" said the girl, advancing cautiously. "- And what a heavy door!"
She touched it as she spoke and it suddenly swung to with a click. "Good Lord!"
said the man. "I don't believe there's a handle inside. Why, you've locked us
both in!" "Not both of us. Only one of us," said the girl, and before his eyes
she passed straight through the door, and vanished.
